name: Ext_R3_StructureMap_gr_ru_so_defaultValue
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.StructureMap.group.rule.source.defaultValue[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureMap.group.rule.source.defaultValue[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureMap|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Default value if no value exists
element.definition: A value to use if there is no existing value in the source object.
element.comment: `StructureMap.group.rule.source.defaultValue[x]` maps to R5 `StructureMap.group.rule.source.defaultValue`.
